5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Wa’il bin Hujr said:“I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) performing prayer while sitting on his right side when he was sick.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْمَرِيضِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the Prayer of a sick person
